Job Role: SalesJob Type: Full-time Who are we?At Bayt.com we are committed to empowering people to lead better lives by providing them with the tools and information to build their lifestyle of choice. We are passionate about our services and seek to deliver the best experience for our customers. Not only are we devoted to our work and customers but most meaningfully to each other's success. We want to better every life we come in contact with and have lasting positive impact on the community. What do we value?1- We strive to be the best 2- We obsess about empowering others to lead better lives3- Create value by doing more with less4- Embrace change with a positive attitude5- Communicate openly, honestly, and oftenIf you can relate to these values then probably our culture is the right fit for you. Apply away! Job SummaryBayt.com is looking for a highly motivated Inside Sales Executive passionate about B2B sales (preferably of services or cloud-based technology) to join our team. You will help accelerate our growth and be responsible for targeting and closing new direct businesses in a defined market. Job ResponsibilitiesAcquire companies that have no significant revenue history with Bayt.com by selling Bayt.com's recruitment products & services,
Initiate and develop a strong relationship with assigned verified leads
Effectively manage the business in an assigned database through a transactional and solution-oriented selling approach
Determine customers' recruitment needs, and prepare proposals to sell services that address these needs
Give online demonstrations to clients on Bayt.com in order to handle objections and convince customers to buy
Follow the Bayt sales pitch stages with rigor and discipline.
Follow daily sales matrix as per the “sales funnel/pyramid” illustrated in the training materials
Produces regular reports on personal sales funnel including all personal stats, and efficiency ratios and analyze your performance
Build a strong pipeline and consistently meet and exSkills
Skills:
Bachelors degree in Business administration, HR or related field
Minimum 1+ years of demonstrated track record of meeting/exceeding sales targets of B2B solutions.

Skilled at building rapport, opening doors, understanding business requirements of senior decision-makers.
Excellent interpersonal, communication, presentation, and negotiation skills
Bachelor's Degree.
Highly energetic, self-starter with a purpose-driven, result-oriented attitude
Competitive, ambitious, career-driven, and accountable personality
Empathy and the ability to understand customer viewpoint and customer service
Ability to work independently and with others.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
While we sincerely appreciate every application received, only those candidates selected for an interview will be contacted.
